title: Ingame keyboard disables
body: I had this problem with specific champions, but I am sure it´s random. My keyboard would all of a sudden disable but work fine anywhere else. It happens when playing {{champion:90}} or {{champion:1}} for me, never had it happen on **annie**one else.

replies.body:
This could be a hardware problem, but it sounds more like a config corruption to me that's failing to react to your inputs.  Start off by resetting you config to get this fixed up.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that gets things fixed up, but test it in a custom game!
